div.p: Illustrious Sir, I have absolutely nothing from Italy; however, since I am now writing there, I will not forget about the bull (papal decree). What I finally received from France (and that was little) I explained yesterday to Mr. Philipp Valentin, so that he too might explain it at the appropriate time, as I hope he has already done or will do shortly.
To your Excellence, whom I wish to be in good health. These are the messages.
The boy who delivered this was followed by another, who brought that other note in the name of Doctor Philipp.
